attributes.action: Censure Mike Gapes MP for wasting tax payers money on EDM 1827.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We are unhappy that Mr Gapes MP has wasted £300 of tax payers money to gloat over that fact that West Ham were not deducted points over the Carlos Tevez affair.  This despite the abitration panel reinforcing the widely held opinion that West Ham were 'deliberately deceitful' and that Sheffield United had done nothing to warrant being relegated.  We were under the impression that EDM's were to raise important issues not glory in the fraudulent behaviour of the football team an individual MP supports
